title: QACOHU Summer Dresses for Women V Neck Ruffle Short Sleeve Casual Shift Dress
description: Material: Polyester. Cute and casual, showing a sense of fashion, quiet ladylike temperament, light and comfortable.
Features: Women's Dresses are Characterized by Ruffled V-neck, Solid Color, Simple, Generous, Thin, Breathable, Soft, Skin-friendly Women's Clothing
Occasion: Suitable for everyday wear in spring, summer and autumn, school, casual, beach, vacation, date, party, club, maternity dress etc.
Summer dress for women Loose and comfortable V-neck for a great fit and comfort when worn, it can be paired with some sweet sandals or trendy heels for a sophisticated and feminine look!
Machine washable, hand wash in cold water recommended, do not bleach, tumble dry low, easy care, hang dry. Does not shrink or fade.
